      public void serializeResponse​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp, Object responseObject) throws IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException
      Description copied from interface: IRemoteCallResponseSerializer
      Serialize responseObject to HttpServletResponse
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      resp - the HttpServletResponse object. Will not be null.
      responseObject - to serialize to resp
      Throws:
      IOException - if resposeObject cannot be serialized
